DOC.brief_summary: Registry collect data use The STAR™ Tumor Ablation System .
DOC.detailed_description: The STAR Prospective Registry observational registry gather clinical safety outcome data patient painful spinal metastasis thoracolumbar spine ( T1-L5 ) follow target radiofrequency ablation ( t-RFA ) treatment STAR™ Tumor Ablation System .
DOC.criteria: Subjects painful spinal metastatic lesion thoracolumbar vertebra ( T1L5 ) treat tRFA use STAR™ Tumor Ablation System . Have sign inform consent Subjects 18 year old Subjects heart pacemaker , electronic device implant Subjects intend tRFA vertebral body level C17
